'''Garden Stellar Musical Pillar''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Garden Stellar Musical Pillar is obtainable from [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|30|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Iron Chunk = 2
|White Iron Chunk = 6
|sort = Iron Chunk;White Iron Chunk
}}
